item.title: Nothing phone 2a: New update for users! - Check how to download - ET Now
item.description:
Exciting Update for Nothing Phone 2a Users: Download Android 15 Now!

Updated Dec 21, 2024 | Source: ET Now

The Nothing Phone 2a has received a significant update powered by Android 15, delivering enhanced features and customization options for users.

  • Latest NOS 3.0 update rolled out for Nothing phone 2a.
  • Users gain access to improved customization features.
  • Enhanced design and performance upgrades included in the update.
"Users of Nothing Phone 2a will experience multiple improvements including a redesigned lock screen and new gallery app features."

This update not only enhances user experience with new design elements but also focuses on improved privacy and security measures. It's a notable advancement for the Nothing Phone 2a, setting the stage for an enhanced user experience.

item.title: ChatGPT for macOS now compatible with Apple Notes and other apps - India Today
item.description:
ChatGPT for macOS now compatible with Apple Notes and other apps

Published On: Dec 21, 2024

Published By: Aman Rashid

OpenAI has introduced a new update for the ChatGPT app on macOS, enhancing its functionality by allowing integration with popular note-taking and coding applications.

  • ChatGPT can now interact with apps like Apple Notes, VSCode, and more, offering real-time assistance to users.
  • This feature is currently available only for paid subscribers but will roll out to free users next year.
  • The integration allows users to activate ChatGPT in any supported app using the shortcut Option + Space.
  • Privacy controls are in place, ensuring users manage when and how ChatGPT interacts with their apps.
“ChatGPT can now work with approximately 30 macOS apps,” said Kevin Weil, Chief Product Officer at OpenAI.

This update enriches user productivity by allowing seamless access to ChatGPT's capabilities directly within applications.

item.title: New iQOO 13 update rolling out, fixes Dark Mode and App Compatibility issues - NerdsChalk
item.description:
New iQOO 13 update rolling out, fixes Dark Mode and App Compatibility issues

Date: December 2024

Source: NerdsChalk

iQOO has just released a new software update for the iQOO 13, bringing several improvements and fixes that users have been waiting for. The update weighs in at around 748 MB, and it is packed with enhancements for Dark Mode, third-party apps, and overall system security.

  • Key Points:
    • System updated with December 2024 Google security patch.
    • Optimized Dark Mode to fix display issues in apps and system interfaces.
    • Improved compatibility for third-party apps to resolve crashes.
  • Update Version Details:
    • Device: iQOO 13
    • Software Version: PD2408F-EX-A-15.0.10.8.W30
    • File Size: Approx. 748 MB
  • How to Update:
    • Check for updates in Settings > System Update.
    • Ensure stable internet and at least 50% battery to download and install.
    • Device will reboot automatically upon installation completion.

Stay tuned for more news on upcoming updates and features!

item.title: Samsung S95F OLED TV: what we want to see - TechRadar
item.description:
Samsung S95F OLED TV: What to Expect from the Next Generation

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: TechRadar

Samsung's S95 series OLED TVs, known for their exceptional picture quality and advanced QD-OLED technology, are set to continue evolving with the upcoming S95F model slated for release in 2025. While the current S95D has already earned accolades as one of the best TVs of 2024, the next iteration promises enhancements in AI-driven picture processing, smarter interfaces, and potentially new screen sizes.

  • The S95F will introduce advanced AI capabilities for picture and sound optimization.
  • It aims to improve peak brightness and reflection management.
  • Gamers can expect AI game optimization and higher refresh rates for a smoother experience.
  • Sustainability will be a focus, with the use of eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient design.
“If Samsung can combine these refinements with stunning picture quality, the S95F OLED could become a flagship TV that truly delivers on all fronts.”

The Samsung S95F OLED TV is positioned to redefine the flagship TV standard, ensuring it meets the growing demands of cinephiles and gamers alike.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra price cut on Amazon—How to buy it with a ₹38,000 discount - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Price Cut on Amazon—How to Buy It with a ₹38,000 Discount

Date: Dec 21, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is now available at an effective price of ₹91,010, reflecting a significant discount of ₹38,989 from its launch price.

  • The phone's price has been reduced to ₹95,800 on Amazon India.
  • Proper use of an Amazon ICICI credit card allows buyers to further reduce the price to ₹91,010 through cashback.
  • Digging deeper into its value, the S24 Ultra competes well against upcoming models with its features.
“Buying the S24 Ultra at around ₹90,000 is a good deal.”

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is a strong contender in the flagship market, especially with its current discount making it an appealing option for those in need of a high-end smartphone.

item.title: Check out these top 5 budget-friendly phones under Rs 15000 with dual cameras - DNA India
item.description:
Top 5 Budget-Friendly Smartphones Under ₹15000 with Dual Cameras

Publication Date: 2024-12-21 | Source: DNA India

This article highlights five dual-camera smartphones priced under ₹15,000, emphasizing their impressive features for budget-conscious consumers.

  • Poco M7 Pro 5G: ₹13,999, 50MP primary camera, 20MP front camera, Dimensity 7025 chipset, 5,110mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
  • CMF Phone 1: Stylish design, 50MP main camera, 16MP front-facing camera, runs on Dimensity 7300 chipset.
  • Motorola G64 5G: ₹12,999, 50MP primary camera, 6,000mAh battery, smooth 120Hz FHD+ display.
  • Redmi Note 13 5G: ₹14,008, 108MP primary camera, MediaTek Dimensity 6080 processor.
  • Samsung Galaxy A15 5G: ₹14,998, triple-camera system, 5,000mAh battery, powered by Dimensity 6100+ chipset.
“Check out these affordable yet feature-packed smartphones and find the one that best suits your needs.”

These smartphones offer great value for budget-conscious customers looking for good camera capabilities.

item.title: Google Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking AI Model Unveiled With Advanced Reasoning Abilities - ABP Live
item.description:
Google Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking AI Model Unveiled With Advanced Reasoning Abilities

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: Not specified

Google has unveiled its new Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking AI model, focusing on advanced reasoning and problem-solving capabilities, significantly enhancing its predecessor.

  • Gemini 2.0 can tackle intricate tasks including programming and complex reasoning.
  • The model emphasizes transparency in AI processes.
  • It is designed to actively generate thought processes during problem-solving.
  • Capable of handling multimodal queries and advanced coding challenges.
  • Planned broader rollout in early next year.
  • Supports over 32,000 tokens input and accepts text and image inputs.
“This advanced AI system is designed to enhance reasoning by actively generating its thought process during problem-solving.” - Jeff Dean, Google DeepMind

Gemini 2.0 represents a substantial upgrade in Google's AI capabilities, with potential applications in various complex domains.

item.title: GTA Online brings festive cheer with snowfall, holiday events, new vehicles, rewards, and triple bonuses - HT Tech
item.description:
GTA Online Brings Festive Cheer with Snowfall, Holiday Events, New Vehicles, Rewards, and Triple Bonuses

Publication Date: December 19 - January 1, Source: Hindustan Times

The festive season has arrived in GTA Online, featuring snowfall in Los Santos and numerous holiday events that offer rewards and new vehicles for players.

  • Los Santos is experiencing rare snowfall and holiday decorations.
  • New vehicles available for purchase include the Invetero Coquette D10 Pursuit and the Willard Outreach Faction.
  • Double rewards are offered for activities through January 1, including Garment Factory passive income and Pizza Deliveries.
  • Players logging in between December 19 and January 1 can receive holiday gifts, including festive clothing and weapons.
  • The Entourage (Festive Remix) mode offers triple rewards for players seeking extra GTA$ and RP.
“This holiday season, GTA Online brings new content and bonuses to keep the festivities going strong.”

In conclusion, the festive updates in GTA Online aim to enhance player experience during the holiday season, encouraging participation in seasonal events and special rewards.

item.title: Apple May Rename iPhone SE 4 as iPhone 16e - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Apple May Rename iPhone SE 4 as iPhone 16e

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Apple is expected to launch the iPhone SE 4 early next year, with rumors suggesting a potential rename to iPhone 16e to join the iPhone 16 series lineup.

The upcoming budget iPhone is set to align with features and designs from the iPhone 16 series including a 6.1-inch display and enhanced AI capabilities.

  • Display: 6.1-inch display, upgrading from the previous 4.7-inch.
  • Camera: 48MP main lens compared to the 12MP of iPhone SE 3.
  • OLED Display: Expected upgrade from LCD to OLED technology.
  • Battery: 3279 mAh capacity used in iPhone 14.
  • Chipset: Rumored to feature the A18 chipset.
  • RAM: 8GB, improving AI technology support.
  • Charging Port: USB-C, aligning with new flagship models.

Anticipated launch for the iPhone SE 4/iPhone 16e is set for March 2025.

item.title: Review: The Bose Smart Soundbar has a boring name and great sound - Mashable
item.description:
Bose Smart Soundbar Review: Great Sound, Boring Name

Publication Date: September 2024 Source: Mashable

The Bose Smart Soundbar has become a popular choice among mid-range soundbars, priced typically at $399, with a focus on delivering great sound quality for TV shows, movies, and music.

  • The soundbar provides a clear and balanced audio experience.
  • Features like AI Dialogue Assist enhance dialogue clarity.
  • Competes effectively with higher-end products while remaining budget-friendly.
  • Setup is quick and user-friendly, although there are some connectivity issues noted.
"For most users, this soundbar hits the sweet spot in terms of features, sound, and value for the dollar."

In conclusion, while the Bose Smart Soundbar may lack creativity in its name and design, it excels in sound quality and functionality, making it a worthwhile investment for audio enthusiasts.

item.title: OnePlus 13R Chipset Details Confirmed Ahead Of India Launch On January 7; Check Expected Specs, Price - Zee News
item.description:
OnePlus 13R Chipset Details Confirmed Ahead Of India Launch On January 7

Date: January 7, 2023 Source: Zee News

The Chinese electronics company OnePlus is set to launch its OnePlus 13R smartphone in India during the OnePlus Winter Launch Event on January 7, along with the OnePlus Buds Pro 3. The company has confirmed that the device will be powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.

Expected Price In India

The OnePlus 13R is anticipated to be priced around Rs 45,000, comparable to competitors like the Vivo V30 Pro and Realme GT 6.

Expected Specifications

  • 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ LTPO AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate
  • Peak brightness of 4,500 nits
  • Dolby Vision support
  • 6,000mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging
  • Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC with up to 24GB LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB UFS 4.0 storage
  • Triple camera setup: 50MP main, 50MP ultrawide, 50MP telephoto with 3x optical zoom
  • 32MP front camera for selfies

Both the OnePlus 13R and its predecessor are expected to run ColorOS 15 based on Android 15.

item.title: WhatsApp Update: Festive Features to Boost Holiday Fun - The Hans India
item.description:
WhatsApp Update: Festive Features to Boost Holiday Fun

Publication Date: December 2023

Source: WhatsApp Press Release

WhatsApp embraces the festive spirit with exciting features designed to make this holiday season more interactive and joyful. The popular messaging platform announced its New Year-themed updates, offering users unique ways to connect and celebrate.

  • Customized festive backgrounds, filters, and effects for video calls.
  • Animated reactions that light up screens with confetti when sending party emojis.
  • New Year's Eve sticker pack and avatar stickers tailored to the festive season.
  • 10 unique effects for video calls, including fun themes like puppy ears and underwater visuals.
  • Ability to select specific participants for group calls without disrupting the chat.
  • Real-time typing indicators in chats for better clarity in conversations.
  • Voice message transcription feature that converts voice messages into text while ensuring recipient privacy.
“With these innovative updates, WhatsApp aims to bring users closer during the holiday while providing a seamless and engaging communication experience.”

These new features enhance both festive celebration and everyday communication, making WhatsApp a more interactive platform for users.

item.title: Vivo X200 Pro vs Vivo X100 Pro: Here’s what’s new in the new generation smartphone - HT Tech
item.description:
Vivo X200 Pro vs Vivo X100 Pro:

Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source]

The Vivo X200 Pro has launched in India, bringing significant upgrades over the X100 Pro, especially in camera and performance.

Key Points:

  • Both models feature an elegant design, but the X200 Pro includes refinements such as flat screen and improved durability with IP69 rating.
  • The X200 Pro's display has quad-curved features and offers enhanced fingerprint scanning technology.
  • X200 Pro's camera setup includes a robust 50MP primary, 50MP ultrawide, and 200MP telephoto lens, providing superior performance over the X100 Pro's 50MP setup.
  • Powered by the new MediaTek Dimensity 9400, the X200 Pro significantly outperforms the X100 Pro’s Dimensity 9300 chipset.
  • The pricing starts at ₹94,999 for the X200 Pro compared to ₹96,999 for the X100 Pro.
“The new ZEISS APO certification enhances the camera performance of the Vivo X200 Pro, making it a worthy upgrade.”

In summary, the Vivo X200 Pro offers meaningful enhancements that may justify the upgrade for consumers seeking the latest technology.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Launch Date, Price In India, Design, Cameras, AI Features And More, All Latest Leaks - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air: Launch Date, Price, Design, and Features

Publication Date: Not specified Source: MacRumors

Apple's much-anticipated iPhone 17 lineup, including the ultra-slim iPhone 17 Air, is set for a September 2025 launch. The series is generating excitement with its innovative designs and upgraded features.

  • The iPhone 17 Air may be Apple's thinnest iPhone yet at just 6.25mm thick.
  • All models will feature improvements including ProMotion technology for smoother displays.
  • The iPhone 17 lineup includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
  • Prices in India are expected to start at Rs 79,900 for the standard model and Rs 89,900 to Rs 99,900 for the Air.
  • The series will debut Apple’s A19 chip and in-house 5G modem.
"The iPhone 17 Air is rumored to feature a 6.6-inch LTPO display with refresh rates up to 120Hz."

The upcoming iPhone 17 series is highly anticipated due to its innovative specifications and sleek design, positioning Apple to continue leading the smartphone market.

item.title: Reliance Jio Unveils JioTag Go - APAC News Network
item.description:
Reliance Jio Unveils JioTag Go

Date: Mumbai

Source: Apac News Network

Reliance Jio has launched the JioTag Go, an affordable tracking device designed specifically for Android users in India. This compact device integrates with Google’s Find My Device network, allowing users to track personal belongings such as keys, wallets, and bags.

The JioTag Go connects to the Find My Device app, offering real-time location tracking and alerts if items move out of range. Weighing approximately 9 grams, the device features a replaceable battery with a lifespan of up to one year and emits a sound of up to 120 decibels to locate items easily.

  • Integrates with Google’s Find My Device.
  • Real-time location tracking.
  • Replaceable battery lasting up to one year.
  • Built-in speaker with 120 dB sound.
  • Available through multiple retail channels.
“This release addresses the rising need for personal tracking devices, offering a practical solution for both everyday and professional use.”

The launch of the JioTag Go signifies Jio’s expansion into connected device solutions, aiming to enhance its market position with user-centric products.
